title: The copies of two speeches in Parliament The one by Iohn Glanvill Esquire. The other by Sir Henry Martin Knight. At a generall committee of both houses, the 22. of May. 1628.
author: Glanville, John, Sir, 1586-1661.
notes: "Sir Henry Martins speech" (caption title) has separate pagination and register; text commences "My Lords, the worke of this day ..". Variant: lacking this caption title. Certain parts of the text also show minor resetting.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
